title: DDFP 588: Rams-Chargers Training Camp Extravaganza
itunes:title: DDFP 588: Rams-Chargers Training Camp Extravaganza
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined by Chargers CB Casey Hayward, Rams punter Johnny Hekker and Rams WR Cooper Kupp at the L.A. teams' joint training camp practice in Irvine, California. Shek and Casey talk about the fights that broke out at camp and who he would line up against on the Raiders. Then, Hekker details his pep talks as well as his thoughts on kicking barefoot. Lastly, Cooper Kupp discusses his experience working with Coach McVay. Plus, a fan joins the show and Shek tests his knowledge of the DDFP.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
